snippet: Critics say the bill is not specific enough to help India's malnourished.
abstract: Critics say the bill is not specific enough to help India's malnourished.
lead_paragraph: While the fracas over the anti-corruption legislation known as the Lokpal Bill dominated the most recent session of Parliament, another new bill that is likely to more directly affect the lives of hundreds of millions of Indians has received much less attention.

headline.main: Will the Food Security Bill Fight Hunger?
